title: $:/litClock/times/-16:45-EM Forster
quote_last: Miss Haddon went to tea with the Principal, who explained why she desired all the pupils to learn the same duet. It was part of her new co-ordinative system.

title: $:/litClock/times/-16:45-Raymond Carver
quote_first: The next day Bill took only ten minutes of the twenty-minute break allotted for the afternoon and left at
quote_last: . He parked the car in the lot just as Arlene hopped down from the bus.
